attributes.action: Proclaim St David's Day as a national holiday in Wales.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wales, Scotland, England and Northern Ireland have the least number of bank holidays in Europe. The national days of these countries are ideal opportunities to increase the number of days and at the same time allow us to celebrate our individual culture, languages and identities.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Proclaim St David's Day as a national holiday in Wales."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11078.asp
